devdoc.title: Handles access control per contract function.

constructor.notice: Initializes access control to functions and sets initial access to grantAccess function.

grantAccess(bytes4,address).notice: Grants access to an account for a function.Set account to zero address to revoke access.

hasAccess(bytes4,address).notice: Returns boolean value if account has access to function.

userdoc.notice: This contract is intended to be used by the Bridge contract.
